attributes.comment:
I'm strongly against this so called "adjustment". The immigration benefit
application/ petition and biometric fee has been raised so many times in the past
ten years. Ironically, these "adjustment" didn't make things better. From time to
time, INS is notorious for its beauracracy and numerous mistakes which delay
millions of new immigrants' in getting green cards they deserve. They've worked
their butt off for this country and kept paying tax for years. Still, they have not
seen the end of the tunnel. It's so unfair and outrageous!!!!! Now, it's time for INS
to put in place a more sensible, responsible, and fair immigration policy in place
to work for the interests of this great nation.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
